-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://hkmdb.com/db/movies/view.mhtml?id=5761

Fan Min (Chan Wai Man) returns home only to find his dead father due to a drug overdose. Fan Min is then arrested because of his pass criminal activities and he is sent to prison for a short term. Superintendent Chan (Tung Lam) of the narcotic bureau is in need of an informant to penetrate a major drug syndicate ran by Big Brother (Tien Feng).
 Chan is approached with the idea of Fan Min working as an undercover agent, taking into consideration his immense fighting capabilities and good behavior during his prison sentence. Fan Min willingly accepts the offer and begins his work immediately.
 Fan Min then meets with his old prison friend Teddy Chan of who is a bodyguard to Tien Feng's wife known as Big Sister (Tina Chin Fei).
 Fan Min, highly recommended by his friend Teddy Chan, is then hired by Big Sister to be her bodyguard. Action packed with a twisted ending.
